publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4035 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Crime (International Co-operation) Act 2003 (Designation of Participating Countries) (Scotland) (No.2) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Crime (International Co-operation) Act 2003 (Designation of Participating Countries) (Scotland) (No.2) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-4035 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Crime (International Co-operation) Act 2003 (Designation of Participating Countries) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Crime (International Co-operation) Act 2003 (Designation of Participating Countries) (Scotland) (No. 2) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
